sentences.sContent: It should not be limited or constrained by any transcendent standards or moral laws that do not derive from politics itself, whether a law of God or some kind of transcendent moral order or code.
sentences.sContent_eng: It should not be limited or constrained by any transcendent standards or moral laws that do not derive from politics itself, whether a law of God or some kind of transcendent moral order or code.
sentences.sCn: 它不可以被任何超验的准则或道德条律所，限制和束缚，因为那些并非源自于，政治本身，无论那是上帝的法则，还是，某种超验的道德命令或准则。

remMethod.val: de+rive(看作river， 河)→黄河是中华文明的发源地→起源

words.tran: 得到；推断（derive的过去分词）；由…而来

trans.tranOther: to develop or come from something else

trans.tranCn: 取得； 导出， 引申
trans.tranOther: to get a chemical substance from another substance
